Hi, my name is Hristo and I am currently a sophomore at Yale studying Computer Science. Here are some things I've made:

  • Amaziograph

    An iPad app for creating tessellations and mandalas

  • 3D Minesweeper

    A 3D version of Minesweeper I wrote for my Computer Graphics class

  • Calligraphy

    I occasionally write things with dip pens in my free time — see them on my instagram.
